overview: This isn’t a happy story. This is a story of grief, of loss, of fire and fury. It’s the story of a boy who knew nothing, and something outside of him that pulled him into a shadowy place beyond good and evil to show him his darkness, his malice, his vastness, and ultimately, his real self. This is the story of OBLIVIØN.
tagline: No tree can grow to heaven unless its roots reach down to hell.
title: INTO OBLIVIØN, Episode 03: Cherufe
